content: materials size h or 5 0 mm crochet hook medium worsted weight yarn in green tree brown trunk yellow star and desired colors for ornaments/garland tapestry needle for sewing on pocket poly-fil stuffing size finished product is 9 in from top to of tree to bottom of trunk can be made bigger or smaller by adjusting hook size and yarn weight abbreviations chain- chain single_crochet- single_crochet half_double_crochet- half_double_crochet increase- single_crochet increase slip_stitch- slip_stitch magic_ring magic_ring fo- fasten_off
